newsitem.title: ITALY: Specialists bid for 560 bln lire of Italy BTP.
newsitem.headline: Specialists bid for 560 bln lire of Italy BTP.

text.p: Specialist bond traders bid for 560 billion lire of 10-year fixed-rate bonds (BTP) against the Italian Treasury's offer of 400 billion lire of paper.
Earlier, the Treasury received bids for 7.042 trillion lire at the open auction for the July 1, 2007 paper, against four trillion lire worth of certificates on offer.
The auction price was set at 103.40 from 100.55 at the previous CCT sale on June 27.
